attributes.action: Remove prescription charges for cancer treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Did you know that not all cancer treatment is free?  Even the terminally ill have to pay.

I do not get free prescriptions because cancer therapy keeps me well enough to work for a living.  I am penalised for working by being obliged to pay for my treatment.

Please support me in urging the government to put an end to this unfair charge.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
